org.mini2Dx.minibus

Class MessageExchange

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.minibus.MessageExchange
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConcurrentMessageExchange, ImmediateMessageExchange, IntervalMessageExchange, OnUpdateMessageExchange

    public abstract class MessageExchange
extends java.lang.Object
    Sends and receives MessageDatas - base class for implementations.

      • MessageExchange

        public MessageExchange(MessageBus messageBus,
                       MessageHandler... messageHandlers)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        messageBus - The MessageBus that this MessageExchange belongs to
        messageHandlers - The MessageHandler instances to notify when MessageDatas are received

    • Method Detail

      • preQueue

        protected boolean preQueue(MessageTransmission messageTransmission)
        An overidable method for processing a MessageTransmission before queueing into this MessageExchange
        Parameters:
        messageTransmission - The MessageTransmission to process
        Returns:
        True if this MessageTransmission should be queued

      • postQueue

        protected void postQueue(MessageTransmission messageTransmission)
        An overidable method for processing a MessageTransmission after queueing into this MessageExchange. Note this method is only called if the MessageTransmission was successfully queued.
        Parameters:
        messageTransmission - The MessageTransmission to process

      • flush

        protected void flush()
        Flushes all MessageDatas in the queue to MessageHandler.onMessageReceived(String, MessageExchange, MessageExchange, MessageData)

      • update

        public abstract void update(float delta)
        Updates this MessageExchange
        Parameters:
        delta - (in seconds) The timestep or amount of time that has elapsed since the last frame

      • isImmediate

        public abstract boolean isImmediate()
        Returns if this consumer immediately processes MessageDatas
        Returns:
        True if this MessageExchange should process MessageDatas immediately as they are published
